title: in the jurisdiction to which the order relates in respect of solicitors whose names
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Solicitors Act 1954 (Section 44)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Solicitors Act 1954 (Section 44) 

(Scotland) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited solicitor act 1954 (section 44) (scotland) order 2020

title: in the jurisdiction to which the order relates in respect of solicitors whose names
heading: 2. The 1st day of January 2021 is appointed as the day on which section 44
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of January 2021 is appointed as the day on which section 44 
(inserted by section 52 of the Solicitors (Amendment) Act 1994 (No. 27 of 
1994)) of the Solicitors Act 1954 (No. 36 of 1954) shall come into operation in 
relation to the profession of solicitor in Scotland. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 December, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [743] 3

title: in the jurisdiction to which the order relates in respect of solicitors whose names
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order brings section 44 of the Solicitors Act 1954, inserted by section 52 of 
the Solicitors (Amendment) Act 1994, into operation in relation to the profession 
of solicitor in Scotland. The effect of the order is that a solicitor qualified in 
Scotland may be admitted as a solicitor in Ireland. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [743]
